attributes.action: Make fines payable as a percentage of income instead on static charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where fines are administered for offences, they should be calculated by the weekly income of the individual.  Thereby making the system equal and fair to all - If you earn £150 per week a parking ticket would be 10% - ie £15 if you earn £1,000 the fine should be £100.  Too many people on large incomes break laws because the fixed penalities are miniscule in relation to their incomes
